TopicTitle: i am new and addicted to KSP. best game EVER!

Articles.Content: hello KSP forum members i am new here and i would just like to say hello everyone =D along with that dose anyone know of any good mods? and to end this off. i have been having some weird crashing problems with .17 with no bods installed anyone els have this issue? i hope im not the only one.

hello KSP forum members i am new here and i would just like to say hello everyone =D along with that dose anyone know of any good mods? and to end this off. i have been having some weird crashing problems with .17 with no bods installed anyone els have this issue? i hope im not the only one.

Hey welcome to the forums:) squad has said that KSP .17 will crash until they get it fixed in a minor update. Here is a brilliant mod site I use http://www.kerbal.net/

Welcome to the forums, xaphan6669.

Just have a look around in the add-on section, you will find one you like in there or at http://www.kerbal.net.

Also, SQUAD are working on a 0.17 patch called 0.17.1 which will fix lots of bugs that were sneaky enough to get past the testing phase.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Hi xaphan6669, welcome to the community

Weird crashing? Are you running KSP from the Desktop by any chance?

Try copying KSP to C:\Games and running the copy.
thanks for the warm welcome everyone =) dose anyone know if mechjeb will be updated to have transfer burns in the orbital operations to the other planets and not just our moons?
It already does. You have to exit Kerbin's SOI. Once you are orbiting Kerbol, the options for interplanetary transfer are available.
How many game crashes have you encounted lately?

Hello there mighty good one!

I hope you have a splended time launching.

Also, check out www.kerbal.net and find some good mods! I recomend the protractor mod to get to other planets!

Anyhow, you are doing good, and i wish you well.

Happy exploding!

-TD.
